snippet: Security challenges will be immense, as the route covers 26.2-miles in eight cities and towns along a path lined by spectators on both sides.
abstract: Boston continues preparations for ceremony to honor those killed and injured in bombings at 2013 Boston Marathon and to stage 2014 race that organizers say will be one of city's biggest and safest; security challenges will be immense, as route covers 26.2-miles in eight cities and towns along path lined by spectators on both sides.
lead_paragraph: Security challenges will be immense, as the route covers 26.2-miles in eight cities and towns along a path lined by spectators on both sides.

headline.main: Boston Plans to Tighten Security at Marathon
headline.print_headline: Boston Plans to Tighten Security at Marathon
